title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1599/88 of 24 May 1988 on the application of Decision No 1/88 of the EEC-Finland Joint Committee amending Protocol 3 concerning the definition of the concept of ' originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 1599/88 of 24 May 1988 on the application of Decision No 1/88 of the EEC-Finland Joint Committee amending Protocol 3 concerning the definition of the concept of Â´originating products' and methods of administrative  cooperation
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision No 1/88 of the EEC-Finland Joint Committee shall apply in the Community.
The text of the Decision is attached to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities It shall apply from 1 January 1988.   This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments: Done at Brussels, 24 May 1988. For the Council The President H.-D. GENSCHER
